item.title: Home Block
item.dc:creator: derrekspace
item.content:encoded: {"genesis-custom-blocks/home-block":{"name":"home-block","title":"Home Block","excluded":[],"icon":"genesis_custom_blocks","category":{"slug":"portfoliowp","title":"Portfolio WP","icon":null},"keywords":["home","portfolio"],"fields":{"greeting":{"name":"greeting","label":"Greeting","control":"text","type":"string","order":0,"location":"editor","width":"100","help":"The greeting texts","default":"HI THERE !","placeholder":"Say hi!","maxlength":null},"who-am-i":{"name":"who-am-i","label":"Who am i","control":"textarea","type":"textarea","order":1,"location":"editor","width":"100","help":"","default":"I’m steve milner","placeholder":"Who am i ?","maxlength":null,"number_rows":4,"new_lines":"none"},"photo":{"name":"photo","label":"Photo","control":"image","type":"integer","order":2,"location":"editor","width":"100","help":"Photo to show"},"description":{"name":"description","label":"Description","control":"textarea","type":"textarea","order":3,"location":"editor","width":"100","help":"About me","default":"I’m a Tunisian based web designer & front‑end developer focused on crafting clean & user‑friendly experiences, I am passionate about building excellent software that improves the lives of those around me.","placeholder":"","maxlength":null,"number_rows":4,"new_lines":"autop"},"cta-text":{"name":"cta-text","label":"Button Text","control":"text","type":"string","order":4,"location":"editor","width":"50","help":"A Call-to-Action","default":"more about me","placeholder":"","maxlength":null},"cta-link":{"name":"cta-link","label":"Button Link","control":"url","type":"string","order":5,"location":"editor","width":"50","help":"The destination URL","default":"https://derrekspace.com/about/","placeholder":""}}}}
